movies.title: Venom
movies.plot: An amoral young man is invited to the ordinary family house where he seduces the daughter and tries to seduce the mother but is thrashed and thrown out.
movies.simplePlot: An amoral young man is invited to the ordinary family house where he seduces the daughter and tries to seduce the mother but is thrashed and thrown out.

biography.bio: Søren Strømberg was born on November 27, 1944 in Denmark. He was an actor, known for Bedside Highway (1972), Venom (1966) and Jumpin' at the Bedside (1976). He died on May 14, 2001 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
biography.name: Søren Strømberg

biography.bio: Sisse Reingaard was born on September 23, 1946 in Denmark as Anne-Marie Reingaard. She is an actress, known for Stine and the Boys (1969), Let's Play Hide and Seek (1970) and Fantasterne (1967). She was previously married to Claus Loof.
biography.name: Sisse Reingaard

biography.bio: Poul Reichhardt was born on February 2, 1913 in Ganløse, Denmark as Poul David Reichhardt. He was an actor, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), Cafe Paradise (1950) and Soldaten og Jenny (1947). He was married to Charlotte Ernst, Margareta Fahlén and Lili Lani. He died on October 31, 1985 in Denmark.
biography.name: Poul Reichhardt

biography.bio: Astrid Villaume was born on November 3, 1923 in Denmark. She was an actress, known for Pelle the Conqueror (1987), Qivitoq (1956) and På tro og love (1955). She was married to Carl Magnus von Staffeldt. She died on February 12, 1995 in Denmark.
biography.name: Astrid Villaume

biography.bio: Judy Gringer was born on January 23, 1941 in Denmark. She is an actress, known for The Factory Outing (1978), Majorens oppasser (1964) and In the Middle of the Night (1984).
biography.name: Judy Gringer

biography.bio: Grethe Mogensen was born on May 25, 1937 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She is an actress, known for Tro, håb og kærlighed (1984), Telefonen ringer (1960) and Flagermusen (1966).
biography.name: Grethe Mogensen

biography.bio: Karl Stegger was one of the greatest Danish actors. Karl Stegger was born: Carl Johan Stegger Sørensen. He later replaced the "c" in his first name with a "k" to further his acting-career. He was born in Aarhus on the January 11th 1911. Stegger was educated at Aarhus theatre, where he was hired as an actor for 5 years until 1951. After 1951 he worked at various theatres all around Denmark. But Karl Stegger was mostly famous for his various, and mostly, bi-roles in Danish films and TV. Karl Stegger had his film debut in 1950 with smaller role in [Smedestræde 4]. Stegger subsequently acted in well over 160 films (almost everyone Danish), where he mostly played down-to-earth and sly types. Stegger seldom had a lead part in any film. He became famous in Denmark when he got the part of the father in the Danish film-series: "Far til Fire" in 1955, after Ib Schønberg died (who originally had the part). Another famous part he had was as the scrap dealer in "Olsen-banden i Jylland" from 1971. In 1971 he got a Danish film-price, a "Bodil", for a role as a real-estate salesman in "Ballade på Christianshavn". In his later years, Stegger became even more famous for his role as the Swedish-consul in the Danish TV-epic "Matador". His last role was in 1980 in "Trællenes børn". Karl Stegger died on the 13th of April 1980, he is buried in Søndermark cemetery, Frederiksberg.
biography.name: Karl Stegger

biography.bio: Per Goldschmidt was born on March 11, 1943 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is known for his work on It Don't Mean a Thing (1967), They Are All Like That (1968) and Fantasterne (1967). He died on September 17, 2013 in Copenhagen.
biography.name: Per Goldschmidt

biography.bio: Jess Kølpin was born on September 29, 1944. He is an actor, known for Venom (1966) and aHA! (2002).
biography.name: Jess Kølpin

biography.bio: Vic Salomonsen was born as Vibeke Salomonsen Jensen. She was an actress, known for Jumpin' at the Bedside (1976) and Venom (1966). She died on November 5, 2001.
biography.name: Vic Salomonsen

biography.bio: Tine Schmedes was born on September 4, 1946 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. She is an actress and writer, known for Naboerne (1966), Stine and the Boys (1969) and Venom (1966).
biography.name: Tine Schmedes
